remarks: Each object in a category has an associated identity arrow. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catidex.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
catidex.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
catidex.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
catidex.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
catidex.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
catidex $p |- ( ph -> E. g e. ( X H X ) A. y e. B ( A. f e. ( y H X ) ( g ( <. y , X >. .x. X ) f ) = f /\ A. f e. ( X H y ) ( f ( <. X , X >. .x. y ) g ) = f ) ) $.
$d .x. f g y $.
$d B f g y $.
$d C f g y $.
$d H f g y $.
$d X f g y $.
$d g ph $.
